task.title: Welding on Vehicle Equipped with CEC

context.p: When frame or other welding is required, the following precautions are to be taken to protect the electrical components.

step.cmd: Disconnect battery equalizer ground connection from the batteries. Disconnect battery cables from terminal posts (ground cable first). Disconnect battery equalizer positive connection. Disconnect electrical connections at the ECU.
If additional system ground wires are connected to the frame, they must be disconnected also.
